name: Ghostrick Shot
effectText: Special Summon 1 "Ghostrick" monster from your hand or GY, then you can change 1 face-down "Ghostrick" monster you control to face-up Attack Position. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Ghostrick" Xyz Monster you control; attach 1 "Ghostrick" card from your GY to that monster as material. You can only use each effect of "Ghostrick Shot" once per turn.
